xwikidoc.name: WebHome
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Map
xwikidoc.content:
(% class="box infomessage" %)((( Main page for map application. This application is under development. For a dedicated environment to create maps. Go to [[Map Editor>>Map.MapEditor.WebHome]]. ))) {{velocity}} #if("$!request.mapName" != '') ## Request for creating a new instance #set($docName = ${request.mapName}) #set($targetDocName = "${request.spaceName}.${docName}") #if(!$xwiki.exists($targetDocName) && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('edit', $xcontext.user, $targetDocName)) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($targetDocName, 'edit', "template=${escapetool.url($request.template)}&parent=${escapetool.url($request.parent)}")) ## Stop processing, since we already sent a redirect. #stop #end #end
== Add a Simple Map ==
#if("$!targetDocName" != '' && $xwiki.exists($targetDocName)) {{warning}}The target document already exists. Please choose a different name, or [[view the existing document>>$targetDocName]]{{/warning}} #elseif("$!targetDocName" != '') {{warning}}You don't have permission to create that document{{/warning}} #end
{{html}} <form action="" id="newdoc" class="xformInline" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="parent" value="${doc.fullName}"/> <input type="hidden" name="template" value="Map.Code.SimpleMap.SimpleMapTemplate"/> <input type="hidden" name="sheet" value="1"/> <input type="hidden" name="spaceName" value="Map.Maps"/> <label for="mapName">Map</label> <input type="text" id="mapName" name="mapName" value="Enter your map name" class="withTip" size="50"/> <input type="submit" value="Create Map" class="btn btn-primary"/> </form> {{/html}}
## Handling new Path Map request
#if("$!request.pathMapName" != '') ## Request for creating a new instance #set($docName = ${request.pathMapName}) #set($pathMapDocName = "${request.pathMapSpaceName}.${docName}") #if(!$xwiki.exists($pathMapDocName) && $xwiki.hasAccessLevel('edit', $xcontext.user, $pathMapDocName)) $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($pathMapDocName, 'edit', "template=${escapetool.url($request.pathMapTemplate)}&parent=${escapetool.url($request.pathMapParent)}")) ## Stop processing, since we already sent a redirect. #stop #end #end
== Add a Path Map ==
#if("$!pathMapDocName" != '' && $xwiki.exists($pathMapDocName)) {{warning}}The target document already exists. Please choose a different name, or [[view the existing document>>$pathMapDocName]]{{/warning}} #elseif("$!pathMapDocName" != '') {{warning}}You don't have permission to create that document{{/warning}} #end
{{html}} <form action="" id="newdoc" class="xformInline" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="pathMapParent" value="${doc.fullName}"/> <input type="hidden" name="pathMapTemplate" value="Map.Code.PathMap.PathMapTemplate"/> <input type="hidden" name="sheet" value="1"/> <input type="hidden" name="pathMapSpaceName" value="Map.Maps"/> <label for="pathMapName">Map</label> <input type="text" id="pathMapName" name="pathMapName" value="Enter your map name" class="withTip" size="50"/> <input type="submit" value="Create Map" class="btn btn-primary"/> </form> {{/html}} {{/velocity}}

async_context.name: async_context
async_context.values: doc.reference=Document|icon.theme=Icon theme|locale=Language|request.base=Request base URL|request.parameters=Request parameters|request.url=Request URL|request.wiki=Request wiki|user=User|wiki=Wiki
